meanings.sent1: I found a prutot on the street.
meanings.sent2: She paid for the candy with a prutot.
meanings.sent3: The prutot rolled away like a tiny wheel.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as rare as a prutot in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The prutot shone brightly in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A small amount or sum of money
meanings.sent1: He saved every prutot he earned.
meanings.sent2: She only had a few prutot left in her wallet.
meanings.sent3: The prutot seemed to multiply in his pocket.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was worth more than any prutot.
meanings.sent5: The prutot jingled happily in the jar.
